Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Account.EXPLANATION: The average number of days it takes to pay suppliers.
The average number of days it takes to collect payments from customers.
The average time taken to process an invoice from receipt to payment.
Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Account.FORMULA: Total Time to Process Invoices / Number of Invoices Processed

Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Account.EXPLANATION: The percentage of invoices that contain errors.
Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Account.FORMULA: (Number of Incorrect Invoices / Total Number of Invoices) * 100

Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Account.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to approve an invoice.
Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Account.FORMULA: Total Time for Invoice Approval Process / Number of Invoices Approved

Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Account.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of collection efforts.
Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Account.FORMULA: (Receipts from Collections / (Receipts from Collections + Ending Accounts Receivable)) * 100

Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Account.EXPLANATION: The percentage of receivables that are unlikely to be collected.
The percentage of payments made without errors.
Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Account.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Payments / Total Number of Payments) * 100
